question: What are the common patterns can be observed from countries with high income inequality in 2015, knowing gini greater than 0.4 is considered as high inequality
query: SELECT    country,    gini_reported,    gdp_ppp_pc_usd2011,    population,    category,    income_net FROM    country_income WHERE    year = 2015 AND gini_reported > 0.4 ORDER BY    gini_reported DESC LIMIT 50;
